Class FileManagement

java.lang.Object
files.FileManagement
public class FileManagement extends Object
The FileManagement class contains a variety of procedures and functions that allow the program to be used over and over again without losing progress. The class can save users, reload users, and log in users. The class can also assign users to various classes.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Daniel Santillan

    • FileManagement

      public FileManagement()
      An empty constructor.

  • Method Details

    • setup

      public static void setup()
      Prepares the program by setting up the file and reading in the current data of the file to prepare Users and their affiliations for running of the program.

    • addSchool

      public static void addSchool(String[] information)
      Adds a new school to the database, rewriting the file and inserting the school's entry.
      Parameters:
      information - the information of the school (name, administrator information)

    • addAdmin

      public static void addAdmin(String[] information)
      Adds a new admin to the current school's database, rewriting the file and inserting the admin's entry. A unique user ID is also created.
      Parameters:
      information - the information of the admin (name, password, etc.)

    • addTeacher

      public static void addTeacher(String[] information)
      Adds a new teacher to the current school's database, rewriting the file and inserting the teacher's entry. A unique user ID is also created.
      Parameters:
      information - the information of the teacher (name, password, etc.)

    • addStudent

      public static void addStudent(String[] information)
      Adds a new student to the current school's database, rewriting the file and inserting the student's entry. A unique user ID is also created.
      Parameters:
      information - the information of the teacher (name, password, etc.)

    • addClass

      public static void addClass(String className)
      Adds a new class into the current school's database, rewriting the file and inserting the class's entry.
      Parameters:
      className - the name of the class

    • login

      public static User login(String username, String password)
      Attempts to log in a user based on a username and password. The user is first identified before a password check is completed to ensure a secure log-in process.
      Parameters:
      username - the proposed username
      password - the propsoed password
      Returns:
      the User to log in

    • getStudentNames

      public static ArrayList<String> getStudentNames()
      Collects the names of all students in a particular school.
      Returns:
      a list of the names of all students ([first name] [last name])

    • getTeacherNames

      public static ArrayList<String> getTeacherNames()
      Collects the names of all teachers in a particular school.
      Returns:
      a list of the names of all teachers ([first name] [last name])

    • getClassNames

      public static ArrayList<String> getClassNames()
      Collects the names of all classes in a particular school.
      Returns:
      a list of the names of all classes

    • getUserClasses

      public static ArrayList<String> getUserClasses()
      Collects the names of all classes the logged in user is in
      Returns:
      a list of the classes the user is in

    • assignTeacherToClass

      public static void assignTeacherToClass(String className, String teacherName)
      Assigns a teacher to a class and confirms the assignment in the database.
      Parameters:
      className - the name of the class the teacher will be assigned to
      teacherName - the name of the teacher the class will have

    • assignStudentToClass

      public static void assignStudentToClass(String className, String studentName)
      Assigns a student to a class and confirms the assignment in the database.
      Parameters:
      className - the name of the class the student will be assigned to
      studentName - the name of the student the class will have

    • searchUserByUsername

      public static User searchUserByUsername(String username)
      Returns a User with the same username as the user-provided username. If no users with the username exist, a null User is returned.
      Parameters:
      username - the username being searched for
      Returns:
      the User with that username

    • searchUserByName

      public static User searchUserByName(String name)
      Returns a User with the same name as the user-provided name ([first name] [last name]). If no users with the name exist, a null User is returned.
      Parameters:
      name - the name being searched for
      Returns:
      the User with that name

    • searchClass

      public static Class searchClass(String className)
      Returns a class with the same name as the user-provided class name. If no classes with the name exist, a null Class is returned.
      Parameters:
      className - the class name being searched for
      Returns:
      the Class with that name

    • readFile

      private static ArrayList<String> readFile()
      Reads the file and returns an ArrayList of type String with the contents of the file by line.
      Returns:
      the contents of the file by line

    • setupGroups

      private static void setupGroups()
      Sets up the users according to the database. Delimiters are used to ensure the right type of user is created with the correct information.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      This is the toString method for this class.
